titleInfo.title: Incremental Reference Resolution: The Task, Metrics for Evaluation, and a Bayesian Filtering Model that is Sensitive to Disfluencies
Proceedings of SIGdial 2009, the 10th Annual SIGDIAL Meeting on Discourse and Dialogue
